translations: v．散发传单：分发印有信息或广告的小册子或纸张。
· The activists leafleted the neighborhood to raise awareness about the issue.
活动人士在社区散发传单，以提高人们对这个问题的认识。

sentences.sentence: The only reason we leafleted on the Jewish New Year was because more people than usual go to the synagogue on that day.
sentences.translation: 我们在犹太新年派传单，纯粹是因为那天去犹太教堂的人比平日多。
